paper_abstract: This work proposes the use of a new exponential nonlinear observer for the purpose of parametric identification and synchronization of chaotic systems. The exponential convergence of the observer is guaranteed by a persistent excitation condition. This approach is shown to be suitable for a wide variety of chaotic systems. In order to illustrate the observer design procedure, several examples with simulation results are presented. (C) 2011 IMACS. Published by Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Exponential nonlinear observer for parametric identification and synchronization of chaotic systems
